title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 590.6 - Supplemental guidelines; violation of regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 590.6 - Supplemental guidelines; violation of regulations

State Regulations
(a) The chancellor, or designee, is hereby
authorized to promulgate supplemental guidelines in the use and care of
firearms not inconsistent with this Part. (b) Any violation of university regulations
or procedures governing firearms, rifles, shotguns, airguns or other weapons on
campus shall be cause for administrative and disciplinary action. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
590.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
